articles.description: Fans of the TV series may enjoy the period detail and atmosphere, but this immersive show is frustratingly light on story and drama
articles.content:
It is 1921 and the Shelby clan have made their way from Birmingham to London to conquer the capitals underbelly. They have issued an invitation for a family meeting to which we are invited.
Anyone w… [+2238 chars]
